ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Mistmoor Drum Goes Poof
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not likely if they re a Lore item.  Lore items have the disturbing tendency to poof upon connection with the ground. Talies
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:15 PM 5/16/00 +0000, you wrote:
>--- In eqbards@egroups.com, Ronnie Roads <rkroads@y...> wrote:
> > The head GM on our server replaced my Mistmoore Battle Drum several
>levels ago. I
> > dropped it descending from Kelethin on a lift and it was gone gone
>gone =(.
> >
>
>
>I once found a bag floating midway between the top and bottom of a
>lift in Kelethin. Out of curiosity I went up and down the lift,
>trying to grab the bag on the way. I finally got it - some grubs
>someone had dropped. I wonder if your dropped drums also ended up
>floating midway along the lift?
>
>Adagia, Bard of 14 songs
>Luclin
Not likely if they're a Lore item. Lore items have the disturbing tendency
to poof upon connection with the ground.

Talies
